entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers this evening and risk of a thunderstorm. Clearing near midnight. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 26 April 2023
